column3: A light and comfortable suit made just for young adventurers.
An armor that is simple yet elegant.
A simple set of armor carved out of solid wood.
Designed for brave warrior who faces against enemies at the forefront.
Heavy mail made entirely of polished metal chain links.
A plate armor made of a meteoric stone that consists of unkown substances.
A Tunic that has been granted additional tolerance against certain properties.
Armor constructed of solid metal plates that have been padded on the inside for comfort.
Designed to be used by outstanding warrior who has a remarkable attack skill.
Heavy solid armor made of durable plates of impenetrable metal.
An armor that was accidentally enchanted by Goibne the blacksmith.
A powerful holy armor bestowed to those who pledge themselves to the Goddess.
